Toronto, Canada

Thu, 02/12/2015

SelectUSA Investment Center at the Canadian International Auto Show

February 12, 2015

The U.S. Commercial Service Canada and SelectUSA will host the SelectUSA Investment Center **at the Canadian International Auto Show **(CIAS), Canada’s largest automotive show held in Toronto.

The SelectUSA Investment Center is a joint pavilion featuring SelectUSA, Embassy Canada officials, Canadian companies, and U.S. state, local, and regional economic development organizations.  Participation includes one-on-one meetings arranged by the U.S. Commercial Service Canada, and** excellent networking opportunities** with Canadian manufacturers during the opening day. 

Benefits to participants include:

  • Unique opportunity to meet potential Canadian investors and trade partners
  • SelectUSA and industry briefings on support programs and market opportunities
  • One-on-one business appointments - introductory meetings with potential partners
  • Access to CIAS Official Opening Ceremony and activities (industry/media day, not for public)
  • Extensive networking opportunities at USCS Reception and CIAS Gala Reception

More details are available in our Flyer (PDF).

To learn more or register for the SelectUSA Investment Center, please contact Investment Specialist­ Bojan Opsenica at ** Bojan.Opsenica@trade.gov ** or 416-595-5412 (extension 221).
